com.redhat.victims
Class Settings

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.victims.Settings

public final class Settings
extends Object

Configuration settings are defined and stored by this class. All settings of the VictimsRule are validated and initialized with defaults from this class.

Author:
gmurphy

validate

public void validate()
              throws VictimsException
Validate the current settings against a list of internal validation rules.

Throws:
VictimsException - When validation fails.

inFatalMode

public boolean inFatalMode(String setting)
Returns true if the setting is in fatal mode. Used when determining if the rule should fail a build.

Parameters:
setting - The configuration item to check if in fatal mode.
Returns:
True when the setting is in fatal mode.

isEnabled

public boolean isEnabled(String setting)
Returns true if the value associated with the supplied key isn't set to disabled.

Parameters:
setting - The setting to check if is disabled.
Returns:
True if the setting is enabled.

updatesEnabled

public boolean updatesEnabled()
Returns true if automatic updates are enabled.

Returns:
True if automatic updates of database are enabled.
